com.foreach.across.core.annotations

Annotation Type RefreshableCollection


  • @Target(value={FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
@Autowired
public @interface RefreshableCollection
    Annotation to use on fields that need to be autowired with a RefreshableRegistry collection type instead of the collection of beans from the ApplicationContext.
    See Also:
    RefreshableRegistry, IncrementalRefreshableRegistry

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean includeModuleInternals 
      boolean incremental 

    • Element Detail

      • includeModuleInternals

        public abstract boolean includeModuleInternals
        Returns:
        True if the internal module beans should be picked up.
        Default:
        false

      • incremental

        public abstract boolean incremental
        Returns:
        True if a IncrementalRefreshableRegistry should be created.
        Default:
        false
